<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FSMDateTimeFormatAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>This script will format dates or calculate start and end dates,  then the format the dates.</description>
        <name>FSMDateTimeFormatAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[
			var FSMDateTimeFormatAjax = Class.create();
FSMDateTimeFormatAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	/**
	This function will retrieve an array of date object from the client script:
	value:  dates to be formatted.  if the date is NOW, a new date time will created for format
	duration: work duration or traval duration or NONE
	operator: for start date use SUBTRACT, for end date use ADD or null when duration is NONE
	
	if duration is NONE, just format the date.
	for end date add the duration; for start date subtract the duration.
	*/
	formatDateTime: function(){
		
			var dates = this.getParameter('sysparm_dateToBeFormatted');
			var dateParam = JSON.parse(dates);
			return new JSON().encode(this.formatDateTimeUtil(dateParam));
						
			
	},

	formatDateTimeUtil: function(dateParam){
		var formattedDates = [];
		
		try{
		var dateFormat = gs.getSession().getDateFormat();
			var timeFormat = gs.getSession().getTimeFormat();
			
			for (var i=0; i< dateParam.length; i++){
				var dateToBeFormatted = dateParam[i].value;
				var duration = dateParam[i].duration;			
				var operator = dateParam[i].operator;
				var formattedDate = "";

				var  gDateTime = new GlideDateTime();
				if (dateToBeFormatted == "NOW"){
					//get the current user date display in user time zone and format and create a new GlieDateTime record base on that.
					var temp = gDateTime.getDisplayValue();
					gDateTime.setDisplayValue(temp, dateFormat + " " + timeFormat);
				} else {
					gDateTime.setDisplayValue(dateToBeFormatted, dateFormat + " " + timeFormat);
				}

				if (duration != "NONE"){
					var durationInMilliseconds = 0;
					if (duration.indexOf("1970") != -1){
						//in service portal, durationis in format of 1970-01-01 00:00:00
						var dGdt = new GlideDateTime(duration);
						durationInMilliseconds = dGdt.getNumericValue();
					} else {
						var gDuration = new GlideDuration(duration);
						durationInMilliseconds = gDuration.getNumericValue();		
					}
					if (operator == "ADD"){
						gDateTime.add(durationInMilliseconds);
					} else{
						gDateTime.subtract(durationInMilliseconds);
					}

				}
				var ret = {};
				ret.value = gDateTime.getValue();
				ret.displayValue = gDateTime.getDisplayValue();
				ret.numericValue = gDateTime.getNumericValue();
				
				formattedDates.push(ret);
				
			}
			return formattedDates;

		} catch (err){
			gs.error(err);
		}
	},

    type: 'FSMDateTimeFormatAjax'
});]]></script>
